caption:
#Repost @ofarevolution
 
As a band we aim to have a positive effect on the lives we touch. Doesn't get more impactful than this. We love seeing it when our audience helps others by way of our concerts. Thank you Patrick!  #Repost @pjk_611  
At home resting and recovering from the PBSC donation. Want to thank my family, friends, and coworkers for their support this whole week. Especially want to thank my fiance @kathryn_alton. And lastly, want to thank @ofarevolution because it was their concert back in 2013 @merriweatherpp where I registered to become a donor. There was some fatigue, pain, and soreness involved with the procedure and series of shots but I would absolutely do it again. Thanks to DKMS.org the process went smoothly. If you are thinking about registering DO IT!  There a tons of easy ways to do so. And of course I had to rock the @capitals Jersey for #hockeyfightscancer #capsfightcancer
caption_raw:
#Repost @ofarevolution
・・・
As a band we aim to have a positive effect on the lives we touch. Doesn't get more impactful than this. We love seeing it when our audience helps others by way of our concerts. Thank you Patrick!  #Repost @pjk_611 ・・・
At home resting and recovering from the PBSC donation. Want to thank my family, friends, and coworkers for their support this whole week. Especially want to thank my fiance @kathryn_alton. And lastly, want to thank @ofarevolution because it was their concert back in 2013 @merriweatherpp where I registered to become a donor. There was some fatigue, pain, and soreness involved with the procedure and series of shots but I would absolutely do it again. Thanks to DKMS.org the process went smoothly. If you are thinking about registering DO IT!  There a tons of easy ways to do so. And of course I had to rock the @capitals Jersey for #hockeyfightscancer #capsfightcancer

caption:
Capitals fans are invited to participate in a #RockTheRed Hunt. TODAY at 9 a.m. enlarged individual letters spelling "Capitals" will be hidden at different locations throughout the Washington, D.C., region. Location clues will be released each hour until 4 p.m. through the team's official Twitter account, @Capitals.

Each Capitals fan who first locates an individual letter will receive two tickets to one of the first three home games of the 2016-17 Capitals season, presented by Capital One Bank. Participating fans are eligible to win only one letter's pair of tickets. 
YOU READY?!
caption_raw:
Capitals fans are invited to participate in a #RockTheRed Hunt. TODAY at 9 a.m. enlarged individual letters spelling "Capitals" will be hidden at different locations throughout the Washington, D.C., region. Location clues will be released each hour until 4 p.m. through the team's official Twitter account, @Capitals.

Each Capitals fan who first locates an individual letter will receive two tickets to one of the first three home games of the 2016-17 Capitals season, presented by Capital One Bank. Participating fans are eligible to win only one letter's pair of tickets.
